abstract_summ: • Inhibition kinetics was studied, and in vitro-in vivo extrapolation was performed.De.mem Ltd has added antimicrobial products to its portfolio to address the strong demand for items such as hand-sanitisers and surface disinfectants – in particular in Singapore – because of the coronavirus pandemic.• Quarantine leads to stress condition that can change in dietary habits.Efficacy of hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine in COVID-19 treatment; • Use of hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine in COVID-19 prophylaxis.• Longer-chain perfluoroalkyl substances strongly inhibited carboxylesterase.Envisage Repurposing Ivermectin for SARS-COV-2.The pursuit of nontraditional antibiotics is becoming an increasingly important means to tackle seemingly insurmountable challenges faced by contemporary antibiotic researchers as they overcome the shifting landscape of bacterial pathogenesis, particularly for Gram-negative bacteria [...].•There is currently no robust evidence to support prescribing hydroxychloroquine as a treatment or prophylaxis for COVID-19.At present, there are no studies demonstrating the clinical efficacy of hydroxychloroquine for the prophylaxis or treatment of COVID-19 infection.• Better dietary habits are critical to enhance the body’s immune system against COVID-19.The American Society of Tropical Medicine and Hygiene."Mouse Is Not Man and Blood
